1410880.name: LFF THE EXPANSE
1410880.description:
Overview:

Venture below the Thames to view the London Film Festival’s Immersive Showcase - LFF Expanded. Featuring over 20 different experiences alongside live events and short film screenings

Design

Welcome to THE EXPANSE. Venture below the Thames to view the London Film Festival’s Immersive Showcase - LFF Expanded. Featuring over 20 different experiences alongside live events and short film screenings

Featuring short film screenings, talks, and even a few live shows!

Explore beneath the famous river Thames and go on otherworldly adventures in THE EXPANSE.

Featuring 360 videos, fully immersive interactive experiences and a theatre where you can sit and enjoy a talk or a short film.
1410880.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
